name: The Hero Starts Over at the Academy
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: Misato Kyoichiro, the leader of the strongest group of adventurers, the &quotGolden Seekers,&quot was betrayed by his comrades and left to die.&quotI won&#039t just die like this!!&quotIn his final moments, he activated a reincarnation spell. Kyoichiro successfully reincarnated twenty years later as a student named Asai Kyosuke, a wielder of the &quotVoid&quot attribute.&quotVoid&quot is an attribute mocked for being &quotattributeless,&quot but Kyoichiro knew the truth of this attribute, thanks
